post.text: The next time Trump throws a tantrum, picture him in the Situation Room making life-or-death decisions for us.

comment.author: Mandy
comment.text: Dear Hillary supporter, In consideration of the fact that it has been demonstrated that Hillary Clinton has lied on more occasions than anyone can count, she deleted her e-mails as soon as they became public knowledge, she used Bleach Bit technology to clean her server in such a way that these e-mails could never be fully recovered, and she had many of her cell phones smashed with a hammer to avoid having them analyzed by the FBI; can you please explain to me your blind support for such a corrupt and dishonest person as Hillary Clinton?

replies.author: Cecilia
replies.text: Every one is talking about how our country has become so divided.. The reason for this division is becuse God is looking for his people. We are Not living in the end days. But we Are living in the. End times. Christians can see this But those who walk in the dark cannot. They are blind to what's happen ing in our would. Do you know what will happen when muslims move into positions of power..such As govenors mayors judges And the list goes on. I will tell you what will happen. Islam...sharia law will slowly make its way in. It will be the law of the land It will be the law of. All land And it. Will be called One. World. Order

replies.author: Cecilia
replies.text: Go online to: THE NEW WORLD ORDER OF ISLAM.. Scroll down until you find it
